messages.content: What is the primary function of comfyui-text-pipe-39?
comfyui-text-pipe-39 is designed to modify text by condition.
What category should I look under to add comfyui-text-pipe-39?
To add comfyui-text-pipe-39, look under the 'utils' category.
What type of input can be used in the pattern field?
Are there any images that provide a visual representation of comfyui-text-pipe-39 usage?
Yes, there are two images provided for reference: ./images/1.png and ./images/2.png.
